about_the_game:
Game gift code:

shoufa1

xinshou1

Customer service email: liming9964@outlook.com

QQ: 1595584560 (add customer service QQ, receive gift code, add friends, note: Guardian of Light)

Before she fell asleep, she was one of the gods of creation. Due to the excessive use of the power of the original light element, the side effects were changes in appearance, long sleep and amnesia.

After waking up, the protagonist has been an apprentice in the Dehamer Alchemy Academy. She has lived and studied carefree in the academy since she was a child, and studied alchemy. Because of this, she knows almost nothing about what happened outside the town in the past few days.

Although she is often proud and complacent, and occasionally tinkers with strange objects, she particularly admires and respects the alchemist Dehamer. She always hopes that one day she can travel around the Brulim continent like Dehamer and explore the higher mysteries of alchemy.

After the Void Demon feasted on human evil thoughts, the second war on the continent of Brulim began: "Nightfall" began, the Philosopher's Stone was snatched away, and the protagonist followed the clues to track Loki. The protagonist and the twelve zodiac guardians in the academy (the entry point of the "Nightfall" war) embarked on an adventure to find the Philosopher's Stone and save the continent of Brulim. During this period, they fought various monsters and purified them into demons. They gained experience and growth in the adventures of various empires, and also gained precious friendships. In the end, from various fragments of clues, the protagonist slowly pieced together his own memories, the mystery of elemental power, and the truth of the tearing war and Dehammer.

The battle part of the game adopts real-time battles, and players can fight in the scene with demons of different attributes. Demons are divided into five attributes, gold, wood, water, fire, and earth. The five attributes restrain each other, and using corresponding demons in battle can achieve twice the result with half the effort.
